title: Bandbox And Lid, ca. 1830
provenance: [possibly] From the Alexander Wilson Drake Collection.   Drake Number: 245.
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Blue field printed in pink, white and green.  Varying figures set apart by trees; child riding a goat, girl standing alone; and doves at an altar.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bandbox And Lid, ca. 1830.
ca. 1830. Block-printed paper on pasteboard support. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1917-36-4-a,b.
